mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIMELINE_TB (BOARD_NUM_FK, MEMBER_ID_FK, TIMELINE_START_DT, TIMELINE_END_DT, TIMELINE_TODO, TIMELINE_LOCATION) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{id}, #{startDt}, #{endDt}, #{todo}, #{location})
mapper.select: SELECT TIMELINE_NUM_PK as timelineId, BOARD_NUM_FK as boardNo, MEMBER_ID_FK as id, TIMELINE_START_DT as startDt, TIMELINE_END_DT as endDt, TIMELINE_TODO, TIMELINE_LOCATION FROM TIMELINE_TB WHERE BOARD_NUM_FK = #{boardNo}
